item.title: CodeLayer
item.description: macOS install Install the app from .dmg and run: sudo ln -s /Applications/CodeLayer-Nightly.app/Contents/Resources/bin/humanlayer codelayer-nightly; for i in cld hld humanlayer; do sudo ln -s "/Applications/CodeLayer-Nightly.app/Contents/Resources/bin/$i" "/usr/local/bin/$i-nightly&qu...

item.title: Zero's Garden
item.description: Welcome to my digital garden, where I keep notes of my thoughts and knowledge about topics Iâ€™m interested in like computer science.

item.title: AWS Map
item.description: Networking The AWS backbone network connects AWS Regions, Availability Zones, and the Internet.

item.title: GPT-4 chat demo
item.description: Attention The chat was saved to demonstrate how to ask GPT-4 questions and provide hints. The formula may be incorrect.

item.title: Reputable vendors offering free LLM API
item.description: Cerebras Cerebras provides a generous free tier, but tokens per minute is slightly more limited than others.

item.title: Production container deployments without Kubernetes
item.description: Kamal github.com/basecamp/kamal Kamal offers zero-downtime deploys, rolling restarts, asset bridging, remote builds, accessory service management, and everything else you need to deploy and manage your web app in production with Docker.

item.title: Here document
item.description: Parameter expansion Quote the word in here-documents to inhibit any expansion.

item.title: Line editing
item.description: Read man 3 readline for more information.

item.title: Per, AWK and sed tricks for text file manipulation
item.description: Selecting a paragraph with first line known /^first line content$/,/^$/ works in both AWK and sed for addressing a paragraph, or any content with unique start and end identifiers.

item.title: Zsh word splitting
item.description: Use $=VAR instead of $VAR to force parameter expansions to split $VAR into separate words before substitution, using the IFS as a delimiter.
